name: Heartbeat Bitbreak
description:
Heartbeat Bitbreak

Beatdown to the Beat

Fight in rhythm with the pulse.

Make your way to the heart. 

STORY

Some jerkwad turned himself into a big living tower and took up some prime real estate in the middle of the city. Go kick his fleshy eldritch butt outta there

HOW TO PLAY

Control four party members at the beat of the drums.

Use WASD to choose your character's actions while  trying to strategize how to defeat your enemies. Every turn your party will gain groove, which can either boost your party's attack or be spend to perform a skill. Use your skills and items wisely, which can heal your party, boost your attack, or increase your defense.
